name: Half Dragon
lore: Half dragons are mortals who carry the blood of dragonkind. Some are born to a dragon parent in Humanoid form, while others acquire draconic traits through magical rituals or exposure to powerful draconic magic. Regardless of the source, every half dragon bears unmistakable signs of its heritageâ€”scales, fangs, slitted pupils, and the ability to unleash a devastating breath weapon.
resistances: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, and Poison one type only, determined by dragon ancestry

traits.name: Dragon Ancestry
traits.description: The half dragon has resistance to a damage type and a Breath Weapon damage type determined by its draconic lineage. Choose the ancestor: Black (Acid), Blue (Lightning), Brass (Fire), Bronze (Lightning), Copper (Acid), Gold (Fire), Green (Poison), Red (Fire), Silver (Cold), or White (Cold).

multiattack.description: The half dragon makes two Greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) damage of the type determined by the half dragon's Dragon Ancestry.

damage.notes: Damage type determined by Dragon Ancestry (Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison)

actions.name: Breath Weapon
actions.description: The half dragon exhales destructive energy in a 15-foot Cone. Each creature in that area makes a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) damage of the type determined by the half dragon's Dragon Ancestry on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

damage.notes: Damage type determined by Dragon Ancestry (Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison)
